ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version

about.summary: Low level I/O functions for serial, TCP, UDP, GPIB, VXI-11 and USBTMC interfaces

build.script:
tar -czf ${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz ${{ name }}
octave -W -H --eval "pkg install -global -verbose ${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz"

mkdir -p $PREFIX/bin
cp $RECIPE_DIR/post-link.sh $PREFIX/bin/.octave-${{ name }}-post-link.sh
chmod +x $PREFIX/bin/.octave-${{ name }}-post-link.sh

tests.script:
octave -W -H --eval "\
  pkg list; \
  pkg load instrument-control; \
  disp('instrument-control loaded') \
"

about.summary: Low level I/O functions for serial, TCP, UDP, GPIB, VXI-11 and USBTMC interfaces

build.script:
tar -czf ${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz ${{ name }}
octave -W -H --eval "pkg install -global -verbose ${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz"

mkdir -p $PREFIX/bin
cp $RECIPE_DIR/post-link.sh $PREFIX/bin/.octave-${{ name }}-post-link.sh
chmod +x $PREFIX/bin/.octave-${{ name }}-post-link.sh

tests.script:
octave -W -H --eval "\
  pkg list; \
  pkg load instrument-control; \
  disp('instrument-control loaded') \
"

name: octave-instrument-control
raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  name: instrument-control
  version: "0.10.0"

package:
  name: octave-${{ name }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/gnu-octave/instrument-control/releases/download/release-${{ version }}/${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 04715ef60e9f0cad86a82ebe7a623d198a6d2071c0e67d9d921935b1d1f9e854
  target_directory: ${{ name }}

build:
  number: 0
  skip:
    - if: win or osx
      then: true
  script: |
    tar -czf ${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz ${{ name }}
    octave -W -H --eval "pkg install -global -verbose ${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz"

    mkdir -p $PREFIX/bin
    cp $RECIPE_DIR/post-link.sh $PREFIX/bin/.octave-${{ name }}-post-link.sh
    chmod +x $PREFIX/bin/.octave-${{ name }}-post-link.sh

requirements:
  build:
    - make
    - pkg-config
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
  host:
    - octave >=4.0.0
    - libusb
  run:
    - octave >=4.0.0
    - libusb

tests:
  - script: |
      octave -W -H --eval "\
        pkg list; \
        pkg load instrument-control; \
        disp('instrument-control loaded') \
      "

about:
  homepage: https://github.com/gnu-octave/instrument-control
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_file: instrument-control/COPYING
  summary: Low level I/O functions for serial, TCP, UDP, GPIB, VXI-11 and USBTMC interfaces

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - arjxn-py
